main event: An unidentified object was observed at Hickam AFB, Hawaii on August 18, 1952.
interesting points: The object was described as falling with an altitude of 1765 feet., The sighting lasted 4-5 minutes., The object exhibited erratic movement and changed direction., There were reports of white balloons being released in the area., High-performance noise was noted during the observation.
witness description: Members of the 1500th ABW at Hickam AFB
